rev.comment: /* 2010: 'Fresh' era */ not necessary to duplicate the current logo here; no rationale per [[WP:NFCC]] #10c in any case
rev.diff:
Line 97: Line 97:
===2010: 'Fresh' era ===
===2010: 'Fresh' era ===
â
[[Image:2010 GS Warriors Logo.png|thumb|150px|The Warriors' new logo, 2010]]
 
On June 24, 2010, the Warriors selected [[Ekpe Udoh]], a forward from Baylor, as the 6th pick of 2010 NBA Draft. The Warriors also introduced a modernized version of "The City" logo, with a rendition of the new eastern span of the [[San Francisco – Oakland Bay Bridge]] in the logo and returning to the original colors of royal blue and gold. They are also set to debut new uniforms, which are reminiscent of the 1960s "The City" uniforms.
On June 24, 2010, the Warriors selected [[Ekpe Udoh]], a forward from Baylor, as the 6th pick of 2010 NBA Draft. The Warriors also introduced a modernized version of "The City" logo, with a rendition of the new eastern span of the [[San Francisco – Oakland Bay Bridge]] in the logo and returning to the original colors of royal blue and gold. They are also set to debut new uniforms, which are reminiscent of the 1960s "The City" uniforms.
